column5: Any suggestions? If fishing suckers as bait for spring Pike what is the best way to fish them? (note: suckers are dead) Whole with quick strike rig; or just using pieces? On bottom with slip sinker? Bobber needed? Any advice appreciated.

I am not sure how to link you there properly, but if you did a search on "sucker rig" this would have come up. I think it will answer most of your questions. Jim http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...p;hl=sucker+rig
